column6: - Captain Marvel has a hunch about the REAL reason behind the forced resettlement of the Rocket Girl's people and sets out with a new crew to find proof! - Turns out Carol's got a history with the man behind the plot. Rut roh. - What time is it? When the bad guy tries to blackmail our hero and use the Avengers against her... Could it be PAYBACK TIME?
column8: | writer:Kelly Sue DeConnick | penciller (cover):David Lopez Lopez
